STUDENT_NAME_EN_STRING: English name must be a string.
STUDENT_NAME_AR_STRING: Arabic name must be a string.
STUDENT_NAME_NESTED: Name must be a valid object.
STUDENT_NATIONAL_ID_STRING: National ID must be a string.
STUDENT_UNIVERSITY_ID_STRING: University ID must be a string.
STUDENT_EMAIL_INVALID: Email must be a valid email address.
STUDENT_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
STUDENT_PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
STUDENT_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
STUDENT_PASSWORD_NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number.
STUDENT_PASSWORD_SPECIAL_CHAR: Password must contain at least one special character (@$!%*?&).
STUDENT_PASSWORD_ALLOWED_CHARS: Password can only contain letters, numbers, and special characters (@$!%*?&).
STUDENT_GENDER_IN: Gender must be one of the allowed values.
STUDENT_REGULATION_ID_UUID: Regulation ID must be a valid UUID.
STUDENT_NOT_ELIGIBLE_FOR_SPECIALIZATION: Student is not eligible for specialization.
